snippet.title: 【New Hero Trait】Incarnation of the Gods: Thea
snippet.description:
Torchlight: Infinite New Season Cube of Rapacity will start in May 9th! 🔥
Pre-register Now: https://torchlight.xd.com/us/ep3?f=2

Thea has grown tired of the ambiguous interpretations of the divine oracles and has decided to unleash the power of the gods, transforming into a deity to personally solve problems and implement the will of the six gods from the oracles.

Thea hears the voices of all six gods. Their oracles are loud and urgent, each requiring Xiyā to spread and reveal their message. Even their oracles sometimes conflict with each other, encompassing every aspect of an event's development and foretelling every possible ending.

Thea uses her blessings to create the Divine Realm on Earth. Outside the Divine Realm, Xiyā can use the Agility Blessing to outmaneuver her enemies; while inside the Divine Realm, she harnesses the Tenacity Blessing to confront powerful foes.

Incarnation of the Gods is Thea's second Hero Trait. It can be obtained for free during the global launch in May by exchanging 100 Hero Emblems or by purchasing it with 980 Primocrysts.
